A key can be used as a bookmark in a book, marking the page where you left off reading.
A key can be used as a tool to pick locks, allowing you to gain access to locked doors or rooms.
A key can be used as a makeshift tool to help with small repairs or adjustments, such as fixing a broken zipper or adjusting a watch.
A key can be used as a tool to help with tasks such as picking locks or opening packages.
